title: getAsync​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> DataService.getAsync(player: Player ) → Promise

title: awaitKey​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields </> DataService.awaitKey( player: Player , key: string-- specific index to return ) → any

title: setAsync​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> DataService.setAsync( player: Player , key: string,-- specific index to return set: any-- replace value at index with set ) → Promise

title: acquire​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> DataService.acquire( player: Player -- on player join ) → ()

title: dispatch​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> DataService.dispatch( player: Player -- on player leave ) → ()

title: initKey​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server Idempotent </> DataService.initKey( datastoreName: string,-- Name of datastore to initalize baseTemplate: {[any]: any}-- table to load if no playerdata is found ) → ()
